title: Students / spouses of students: verification of your residence permit application file by ISSO before your online application
description:
This service is provided by the International Students & Scholars Office (ISSO) of Université Grenoble Alpes to all students, PhD students and their families studying at UGA or in one of our partner institutions in Grenoble and Valence.

Please note

I. You cannot submit a residence permit application directly through this form. It is only intended for the verification of your application file by ISSO before submitting it on the national platform, or prior to your appointment at the Préfecture if you cannot access to the online platform.
II. The validation of your file by ISSO does not guarantee it will be accepted by the Préfecture.
III. ISSO will only check the main documents of your file. Please refer to the complete list of required documents, available either on the national online application system or on the UGA international website.
Once you complete the form, ISSO will give you a feedback within a week (on average).
Université Grenoble Alpes, 621 avenue centrale 38401 Saint-Martin-d’Hères, is the data controller responsible for processing the information you will give in this form. The data we ask you to provide is necessary to help you in your residence permit application. Only staff members from UGA department of International Affairs (DGD DIT) will be able to access your documents, and your data will be stored in the servers provided by the Direction Interministérielle du Numérique (DINUM). No information will be communicated to anyone outside of the university, and your application file will automatically be deleted after 6 months. If you wish to exercise your rights within the framework of the European Union’s General Data Protection Regulation, you can make a request by contacting: isso@univ-grenoble-alpes.fr.
zones: Ministère de l'Enseignement supérieur et de la Recherche

champDescriptors.label: Before you start
champDescriptors.description: This service is provided by the International Students & Scholars Office (ISSO) of Université Grenoble Alpes. > You cannot submit a residence permit application to the Préfecture directly through this form. > ISSO only checks student application files. Other requests (i.e. "Salarié", "Réfugié", etc.) will not be considered. > ISSO cannot guarantee that your application will be accepted by the Préfecture. > Requests for applications in other prefectures will not be considered. > The list of all required documents is available on : * The national online application platform https://administration-etrangers-en-france.interieur.gouv.fr/particuliers/#/ * UGA international website (only if you cannot access the online application): https://international.univ-grenoble-alpes.fr > Getting organized > Visas & residence permits

options: Spouse of a Student/ PhD student

options: Alpine Geography and Urban Planning Institute (UGA)

champDescriptors.label: Expiration date of your current visa or residence permit
Reminder
champDescriptors.description: Documents written in a language other than French must be translated by a sworn translator accredited by French courts.

champDescriptors.label: Passport
champDescriptors.description: Identity page. If it is your first residence permit card application, add the page containing the first entry stamp in the Schengen Area.

champDescriptors.label: Current residence permit card or long stay visa
champDescriptors.description: Front and back (residence card)

champDescriptors.label: Proof of the online validation of your Long-Stay Visa
champDescriptors.description: If you have a "Visa Long Séjour valant Titre de Séjour", the pdf you received after the online validation upon arrival.

champDescriptors.label: If you have an « étudiant-concours » visa
champDescriptors.description: Certificate of achievement

champDescriptors.label: If you are married
champDescriptors.description: Marriage certificate (or family record book)

champDescriptors.label: ID photos
champDescriptors.description:
ISSO does not check your ID photos.
If you submit your application online, you will need to provide an "E-Photo": https://permisdeconduire.ants.gouv.fr/services/geolocaliser-les-photographes-habilites
Otherwise, you photos must correspond to the 35 mm x 45 mm format – ISO/IEC 19794 – 5 : 2005 standard.

champDescriptors.label: Proof of address
champDescriptors.description: Dated less than 6 months and in your name, or, if you are hosted, in the name of the person hosting you. Documents accepted: * Electricity, gas, water, phone or Internet bill * House insurance certificate "Attestation d’assurance habitation" * Certificate from a student residence "Attestation de residence" * Rental contract "Bail" * Rent receipt or bill * Attestation from a hotel (only dated less than a month) along with the last bill.

champDescriptors.label: If you are hosted by someone
champDescriptors.description:
« Attestation d’hébergement » form, filled in and signed by the person hosting you.
A template is provided on UGA International website.

champDescriptors.label: If you are hosted by someone [2]
champDescriptors.description: Host’s valid French/European ID or passport, or French residence permit (if it’s a VLS-TS, add the confirmation of the validation)

champDescriptors.label: Certificate of enrollment
champDescriptors.description: (Or pre-enrollment certificate, acceptance letter)

champDescriptors.label: UE mobility program (optional)
champDescriptors.description: If you are in a joint educational programme in UE (dual degree for instance), a document from your school/university mentioning this mobility.

champDescriptors.label: Academic transcripts (students) or letter from your thesis supervisor (PhD students)
champDescriptors.description:
Students: academic transcripts from the previous year, and the current year if available.
PhD students: letter from your thesis supervisor mentioning the subject, achievements and an estimated date for your defense.

champDescriptors.label: Last diploma (or "Attestation de réussite") obtained in France
champDescriptors.description: Only if you obtained a diploma in France, "Licence" or "Master"

champDescriptors.label: Proof of financial resources [1/2]
champDescriptors.description: At least equivalent to 615€ per month, unless you are hosted for free (450€ in this case). The documents must indicate the amount in euros and bank statements have to be stamped and signed. Accepted documents (several of the followings can be used to reach the amont): * Bank statement (such as « relevé de compte » ou « relevé de situation client ») certifying that you have at least 6150€ (10 months x 615€), or 4500€ if hosted for free on your account balance, dated less than 1 month. * « Attestation sur l’honneur de prise en charge » form filled in and signed by your guarantor with the documents listed in the form or the bank transfer order to your account for the academic year * Recent scholarship certificate mentioning the amount in euros and the duration of the scholarship * Work contract with copies of the 3 last pay slips * Contract of apprenticeship or internship agreement

champDescriptors.label: Proof of financial resources [2/2] (optional)
champDescriptors.description: If needed, additional document proving your resources.

champDescriptors.label: Additional documents (optional)
champDescriptors.description: Example: medical certificate, letter explaining your curriculum, etc.

champDescriptors.label: If you apply for a residence permit as a spouse of student
Current residence permit / visa of your spouse
champDescriptors.description: If it is a "Visa Long Séjour valant Titre de Séjour", the pdf obtained after the online validation upon arrival.

champDescriptors.label: certificate of enrollment ("certificat de scolarité") of your spouse
Proof of monthly income at least equivalent to 550€
Please note
champDescriptors.description: If you cannot submit your application online via the national platform, your spouse will have to be with you the day of your appointment at the On-campus Prefecture Office.

champDescriptors.label: Comments (Optional)
champDescriptors.description: Anything you would like to tell us about your documents or situation, or if you think your application requires  immediate attention (justify) :

champDescriptors.label: Done!
champDescriptors.description: After submitting your application, you will receive a first automatic email. About a week later, ISSO will contact you through this platform in order to tell you if your application file is complete or not, or to give you an appointment if you cannot submit your application online.
